short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Tool for sending WhatsApp Templates directly from your CRM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No more exporting customers filter to excel files and importing them to another platform, using this extension you can filter customers as you wish and send them a template message instantly.
